New Records: Coby White's nine three-pointers were a new career-high.
Key Match Events: Jalen Brunson scored 26 points in the first half.
Karl-Anthony Towns added 17 points in the first half.
Coby White nailed a buzzer-beater at the end of the first quarter.
Chicago Bulls dominated the third quarter with a 41-17 advantage.
Coby White and Zach LaVine combined for 66 points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Derrick Rose's halftime ceremony was a significant event.
